@019815: Iceman DVD, as any other mivie from 1970-1990 period (except literally handfull) is so ugly that is almost untouchable. Point being that I have it in the archive, but because is so ugly, I haven't released it. Ripping shitty DVD gives ugly encode - and that's a fact. If movie is good, I would risk getting same rubbish as you can see following  next answer.
